Adesuwa Obasuyi (a mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 1990, Naijiria) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na onye na-akwado mgbanwe ihu igwe na onye n'ebute Sustainable Africa Cities and Communities Initiative, otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-ahụ anya na njikwa ngụkọta mkpofu na Naijiria
Ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ ugbu a dị ka Onye Nlekọta Iwu Mgbanwe Ihu igwe na British High Commission, Abuja.
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Delta State wee nweta nzere Bachelọ na Biochemistry n'afọ 2010; ọ gara n'ihu iji nweta nzere Mastas ya na Environmental Quality Management (2014 - 2017) na Mahadum Benin.
Na mbido ọrụ ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka nyocha mgbe ọ na-akwado gburugburu ebe obibi na mgbanwe ihu igwe
O mechara bụrụ onye njikwa ọrụ na Sustainable Africa Waste Initiative (SAWI)
Ọ gara n'ihu bụrụ onye nnọchi anya TeachSDGS. Ọ bụkwa onye nnọchi anya nke Global Youth Climate Network
Ugbu a, ọ na-arụ ọrụ na British High Commission, Abuja dị ka onye njikwa iwu mgbanwe ihu igwe
O nwere ọtụtụ ahụmịhe na ọrụ afọ ofufo
O wepụtara onwe ya dịka onye ọrụ afọ ofufo na netwọk SDGs nke ndị ntorobịa Naijiria dị ka onye otu na onye nduzi, họrọ ihe mkpofu ahụ na NYSC / otu efu NDLEA na-enweghị ọgwụ ọjọọ na Bayelsa.
